last_episode_to_air.name: Bean Pod'ners
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hokey accidentally grows a giant beanstalk. Up the beanstalk, they enter a castle inhabited by a nice giant and his dog. Of course the wolves run and chop down the beanstalk.

name: The Huckleberry Hound Show
overview: The Huckleberry Hound Show is a 1958 syndicated animated series and the second from Hanna-Barbera following The Ruff & Reddy Show, sponsored by Kellogg's. Three segments were included in the program: one featuring Huckleberry Hound; another starring Yogi Bear and his sidekick Boo Boo; and a third with Pixie and Dixie and Mr. Jinks, two mice who in each short found a new way to outwit the cat Mr. Jinks. The Yogi Bear segment of the show proved more popular than Huckleberry's; it spawned its own series in 1961. A segment featuring Hokey Wolf and Ding-A-Ling was added, replacing Yogi Bear during the 1960–61 season. In 1961, the series became the first animated program to be honored with an Emmy Award. The Huckleberry Hound Show contributed to making Hanna-Barbera a household name, and is often credited with legitimizing the concept of animation produced specifically for television.

episodes.name: Huckleberry Hound Meets Wee Willie
episodes.overview: Huckleberry Hound apprehends a 350-pound gorilla named Wee Willie who has gotten loose throughout the city.

episodes.name: Cousin Tex
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie's country cousin comes by for a visit and tries his version of country tricks on Jinks.

episodes.name: Yogi Bear's Big Break
episodes.overview: Sick of children saying "Hey, Mom, hey, Mom. Look at the bears, look at the bears, look at the bears," Yogi Bear decides to bust out of Jellystone Park. He tries to sneak past the park ranger, but all his attempts at escape backfire.

episodes.name: Lion-Hearted Huck
episodes.overview: Huck goes to Africa to bag a lion but the lion uses all sorts of modern devices to outwit Huck. Finally, the brainy lion is himself bested by a jeep motor.

episodes.name: Judo Jack
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie call upon Judo Jack to teach them how defend themselves against Jinks in the arts of Judo.

episodes.name: Slumber Party Smarty
episodes.overview: Just before he hibernates for the winter, kind-hearted Yogi befriends a cute little duck. Little Yakky Doodle wants to stay with Yogi for the winter.

episodes.name: Tricky Trapper
episodes.overview: This is the old rugged northwest which is protected by the Mounties, and Powerful Pierre is on the loose, and Huckleberry volunteers to catch him.

episodes.name: Kit Kat Kit
episodes.overview: Jinks makes a robot cat to help him get rid of Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Pie-Pirates
episodes.overview: Yogi and Boo Boo get chased away by a chicken rancher. They soon spot a huckleberry pie cooling in a kitchen window, but can't get to it because of a mean old dog. They must sneak past the vicious hound.

episodes.name: Sir Huckleberry Hound
episodes.overview: As a knight in the Days of Old, our hero Sir Huckleberry Hound is determined to rescue a damsel in distress who is being held captive at the top of a castle tower. Her captor, the Fat Knight, tries to block Huck's every rescue attempt.

episodes.name: Jinks' Mice Device
episodes.overview: Jinks builds a machine he thinks will liquidate Pixie and Dixie. It makes the mice invisible and they drive Jinks mad with their tricks.

episodes.name: Big Bad Bully
episodes.overview: A busy little bumblebee is flying around. Yogi and Boo Boo follow it with hopes it will lead them to the honey, but a Big Bad Bull gives them a serious detour.

episodes.name: Sheriff Huckleberry
episodes.overview: Out in the Ol' West, Huckleberry the Sheriff has a warrant for the arrest of Dinky Dalton, last of the Dalton Gang, he's wanted dead or alive. Preferably dead!

episodes.name: Pistol Packin' Pirate
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie are aboard a Pirate ship with a Pistol Packin' Pirate, who threatens Jinks to "walk the plank", if he doesn't catch those "meeses".

episodes.name: Foxy Hound-Dog
episodes.overview: A hunter and his barking dog chase a fox into Yogi's cave. Yogi protects the defenseless little fox from the tenacious hound. The fox hides as a Davey Crockett hat on Yogi.

episodes.name: Rustler Hustler Huck
episodes.overview: Huckleberry Hound must protect his cattle from a rustler in the Old West. The rustler is a tricky one, but so is Huck.

episodes.name: Scaredycat Dog
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie buy a dog for $5 to get Jinks, but the dog is scared of cats. The dog's twin brother then comes to the rescue.

episodes.name: Big Brave Bear
episodes.overview: Two bandits are on the run from the law. They find the perfect hideout in Jellystone Park. Of course, they end up in Yogi's cave!

episodes.name: Freeway Patrol
episodes.overview: Huckleberry Hound is part of the freeway patrol who strikes fear in the hearts of law breakers.

episodes.name: Little Bird-Mouse
episodes.overview: Dixie wishes to fly like a bird, but his schoolteacher won't allow it. Then Dixie uses his ears like flaps and is able to ascend and float this way. Mr. Jinks goes after Dixie to collect a fortune for a flying mouse, surprising Pixie and especially the schoolteacher.

episodes.name: Tally Ho Ho Ho
episodes.overview: During bear-hunting season in Jellystone Park, a little hunter with a long white mustache tries to bag a bear, and that bear is Yogi. Yogi must outwit the persistent hunter.

episodes.name: Two Corny Crows
episodes.overview: Farmer Huckleberry Hound is losing rows on rows of his corn crop to Iggy and Ziggy, a pair of crafty black birds who manage to outwit Huck at every turn.

episodes.name: The Ghost with the Most
episodes.overview: Jinks thinks he killed Dixie. Dixie dresses as a ghost to haunt Jinks and get him to obey him. Jinks finds out and plays his own trick.

episodes.name: Baffled Bear
episodes.overview: Yogi sleeps through a long winter nap. He awakens from hibernation to discover that his favorite forest has been turned into a superhighway.

episodes.name: Cock-A-Doodle Huck
episodes.overview: Down on the farm, Huck is on alert for the fox that is always trying to rob the chicken coop. No matter what scheme ol' Foxy thinks of to steal a chicken, Farmer Huck is there to thwart him- but good.

episodes.name: Jiggers... It's Jinks!
episodes.overview: Pixie, Dixie and Jinks live happily in a cheese factory. Jinks is replaced by a cat named Bullet. All three try creative ways to get back in.

episodes.name: High Fly Guy
episodes.overview: In a nest of triplets, one bird gets left behind by his mother. Yogi befriends the young bird and tries to show him how to fly.

episodes.name: The Ace of Space
episodes.overview: After being chased by Jinks, Dixie dreams he meets Captain Micetro and becomes an invader against Jinks.

episodes.name: The Brave Little Brave
episodes.overview: Yogi delights in following a little Native American boy as he hunts for wild game with his bow and arrow. Yogi tries to help a bunny who's being hunted by the inept Indian boy. More often than not, however, it's Yogi who ends up on the receiving end!

episodes.name: Fireman Huck
episodes.overview: Fireman Huckleberry is called to get a cat out of a tree that a dog keeps chasing around, and the cat keeps going to higher ground.

episodes.name: Jinks Junior
episodes.overview: Jinks teaches his son how to be like him and how to catch mice.

episodes.name: Dragon-Slayer Huck
episodes.overview: The King sends brave knight Huck to slay a fire-breathing dragon.

episodes.name: The Stout Trout
episodes.overview: Yogi goes fishing, but he's up against a very crafty trout.

episodes.name: Jinks the Butler
episodes.overview: Jinks is under orders to guard a banquet. Pixie and Dixie try incessantly to crash the party, until Jinks plants a firecracker in an apple.

episodes.name: The Buzzin' Bear
episodes.overview: Inquisitive Yogi investigates a parked helicopter, leading to a wild and uproarious joyride.

episodes.name: Hookey Daze
episodes.overview: Truant Officer Huck tries to take twin brothers Mickey and Icky Vanderblip back to school.

episodes.name: Jinks' Flying Carpet
episodes.overview: Jinks gets a flying carpet from his cousin in Baghdad, and intends to use it to finally get Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Skeeter Trouble
episodes.overview: Huckleberry Hound goes to the great outdoors to relax, but a pesky Mosquito keeps him from enjoying his getaway.

episodes.name: The Runaway Bear
episodes.overview: A ridiculously wealthy gentleman wants only a bear's head to complete his collection of exotic trophies. Might Yogi oblige?

episodes.name: Puppet Pals
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie makes a chump out of Jinks to fool a dog. Waking from a good night's sleep, Pixie and Dixie go about their job of fighting with Jinks. They run to a bulldog for protection. This time, Jinks explains to the bulldog how they are bothering him. The bulldog agrees to team up with him against the mice.

episodes.name: Be My Guest Pest
episodes.overview: An affable Jellystone Park visitor casually invites Yogi to visit his penthouse apartment in the city- and the bear takes the invitation seriously. Yogi goes to New York City to visit the married vacationer. Milton must hide Yogi from his wife- she does not like Milton's habit of inviting acquaintances over- so Yogi poses as a bear rug.

episodes.name: Sheep-Shape Sheepherder
episodes.overview: Two foxes try various ways to get sheepherder Huck's sheep, but they fail every time.

episodes.name: Mark of The Mouse
episodes.overview: Dixie attempts to scare Jinks with a Mark of the Mouse costume. Jinks plays along, but then he duels the real Mark of the Mouse.

episodes.name: Barbecue Hound
episodes.overview: Huck is set to barbeque his dinner, but a hungry dog wants his big, delicious steak.

episodes.name: Duck In Luck
episodes.overview: A hunter shoots down a little duck (Yakky) who runs for cover, and Yogi saves him from the persistent hunter and his dog.

episodes.name: Dinky Jinks
episodes.overview: Jinks mixes a formula that shrinks him to mouse size. He fails to get Pixie and Dixie and seeks their help from a chasing dog.

episodes.name: Bear on a Picnic
episodes.overview: A couple with a little baby arrives for a picnic in Jellystone Park. This time, Yogi forgets all about swiping picnic baskets, for the baby is always leaving his playpen, and going after animals he thinks are cats. Trouble is, each time Yogi rescues the infant, the overprotective parents wrongfully accuse him of trying to harm the child.

episodes.name: Hokum Smokum
episodes.overview: Old Man Huckleberry Hound recalls to his nephew how he fought a prankish Indian in the west.

episodes.name: Hypnotize Surprise
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie try some hypnotism on Jinks. It all goes wrong when they make Jinks think he's a mouse and he makes himself a train.

episodes.name: Bird House Blues
episodes.overview: Huck makes a new birdhouse for the birds, but crows Iggy and Ziggy moves in. Huck wants them out.

episodes.name: Prize Fight Fright
episodes.overview: Yogi reluctantly becomes a sparring partner for the world champion boxer.

episodes.name: Postman Panic
episodes.overview: Huck the loyal Mailman, makes numerous attempts to deliver mail to a house that has a pesky, yet clever yard dog who laughs like Muttley.

episodes.name: Nice Mice
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie adopt a homeless kitty, but need to keep it away from Jinks.

episodes.name: Brainy Bear
episodes.overview: A crazy professor with a lab in his trailer captures Yogi and his pal Boo Boo. He switches Yogi's brain with a chicken.

episodes.name: Ski Champ Chump
episodes.overview: Huckleberry takes to the snow to become a Ski champion.

episodes.name: King-Size Surprise
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie help a dog called King-Size retrieve his license. In return, he helps them against Jinks until he is taken by a dog catcher.

episodes.name: Robin Hood Yogi
episodes.overview: Yogi and Boo Boo play Robin Hood to get food from the tourists.

episodes.name: Lion Tamer Huck
episodes.overview: Huck portrays a lion-tamer and shows many ways to tame lions.

episodes.name: Cat-Nap Cat
episodes.overview: Jinks has been rewarded for mouse catching. Knowing his secret, Pixie and Dixie decide to interrupt his cat nap.

episodes.name: Daffy Daddy
episodes.overview: Yogi comes across a little kid who wants to play cowboy, but the parents ignore him, so Yogi plays with him.

episodes.name: Little Red Riding Huck
episodes.overview: While strolling in the woods, Huckleberry Hound comes across Little Red Riding Hood on the way to Grandma's house with a basket of cookies, so he dresses up as Red and beats her to the house to save her from the Wolf, who is waiting for Red. Huck finds the Wolf in Grandma's bed. The Wolf doesn't buy Huck's story that he is actually Red.

episodes.name: Mouse-Nappers
episodes.overview: A cat takes Pixie and Dixie away and Jinks begins a fight with him until both of them share the mice.

episodes.name: Scooter Looter
episodes.overview: Yogi steals a ride on a scooter and storms throughout the park out of control as he can't shut it off.

episodes.name: The Tough Little Termite
episodes.overview: Huck the happy homeowner tries to get rid of a tough little pesky termite.

episodes.name: Boxing Buddy
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie meet a kangaroo named Ka-Pow, who Jinks mistakes for an oversized mouse. Ka-Pow is soon reclaimed to star on television.

episodes.name: Hide and Go Peek
episodes.overview: Yogi tries to hide a circus elephant away from the circus guards.

episodes.name: Ten Pin Alley
episodes.overview: Huckleberry goes up against Ten Pin Pierre for the bowling cup.

episodes.name: Hi-Fido
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie try to scare Jinks with ventriloquism, which soon stops working... until it summons a bulldog in the house.

episodes.name: Show Biz Bear
episodes.overview: Jellystone Park is invaded by a movie company. It's filming "The Killer Bear From Outer Space." When its lead star walks out, Yogi takes the part.

episodes.name: Grim Pilgrim
episodes.overview: Huckleberry goes hunting Thanksgiving turkey, accidentally shoots an Indian, and winds up eating knockwurst with the Indian and the turkey!

episodes.name: Rapid Robot
episodes.overview: Jinks gets a cat robot to catch Pixie and Dixie for him. To get even, the mice get a dog robot; in the end, both robots cause chaos.

episodes.name: Lullabye-Bye Bear
episodes.overview: Yogi wants to stay up the entire Winter, but he keeps falling asleep at every activity he attempts which gives the Ranger a rough time.

episodes.name: Jolly Roger And Out
episodes.overview: Huck is sent to sea to bring back a man by the name of Jolly Roger who's weakness is being tickled.

episodes.name: Sour Puss
episodes.overview: Jinks is thrown out by the house butler after disposing of Pixie and Dixie. Jinks gets them back, but the butler takes his job shortly.

episodes.name: Bare Face Bear
episodes.overview: A jewel thief puts on a bear suit to hide out in Jellystone Park. A lawman and his bloodhound Ole Yelp pursue him. Yogi, fooled by the thief's disguise, helps him elude his pursuers. The jewel thief is caught and the credit goes to Yogi, to the chagrin of Ole Yelp who was the only one not fooled by the thief's disguise.

episodes.name: Somebody's Lion
episodes.overview: Big game hunter Huckleberry Hound recalls how he hunted the prankish lion, Leroy.

episodes.name: King Size Poodle
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie disguises an escaped lion as a giant poodle, who misleads Jinks to protect his cover.

episodes.name: Papa Yogi
episodes.overview: Yogi and Boo Boo disguise themselves to attend a "fathers and sons" picnic in Jellystone Park.

episodes.name: A Bully Dog
episodes.overview: Huck is a messenger boy who encounters a unruly Dog.

episodes.name: Mighty Mite
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie invite Champion Rooster El Puncho in their house, who then gives Jinks a punching fight.

episodes.name: Stranger Ranger
episodes.overview: Yogi thinks that a gorilla wearing a ranger's uniform is working for the vacationing Ranger Smith.

episodes.name: Nottingham and Yeggs
episodes.overview: Jester Huckleberry gives a twist on the story of Robin Hood.

episodes.name: Bird Brained Cat
episodes.overview: When the neighbors leave their pet canary with Jinks' owners while they're away, Jinks comes down with a serious case of what he calls "canaryitis". He turns to Pixie and Dixie for help in resisting catching the canary.

episodes.name: Rah Rah Bear
episodes.overview: Yogi catches the headline in the newspaper, Chicago Bears vs. Giants, so he goes to Illinois to support the bears, but everyone thinks he's the mascot.

episodes.name: Huck the Giant Killer
episodes.overview: Huck is a giant killer.

episodes.name: Batty Bat
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie's cousin- who's a bat-mouse- comes for a visit. Because he flies, he can out-maneuver Jinks as he gets food for Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Bear for Punishment
episodes.overview: It's spring and Yogi and Boo Boo are up and looking for food when they come upon Presto the Magician, who makes them invisible so they can sneak food from the tourists.

episodes.name: Cop and Saucer
episodes.overview: Officer Huck is on patrol during the night to keep citizens of the city safe, and on his shift he investigates a flying saucer.

episodes.name: Lend-Lease Meece
episodes.overview: A new cat, Charlie, moves in next door, whom Jinks quickly befriends. When Charlie informs Jinks that the new house has no mice yet, Jinks sends Pixie and Dixie over to Charlie's place until Charlie gets mice of his own.

episodes.name: Nowhere Bear
episodes.overview: After faking being hypnotized by Ranger Smith, Yogi hypnotizes Boo Boo into thinking he's a bird.

episodes.name: Pony Boy Huck
episodes.overview: Huck is a brave Pony Express rider who battles Indians throughout his mail route.

episodes.name: A Good, Good Fairy
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie discover they have a fairy who speaks with a whistle and she grants them wishes.

episodes.name: Wound-Up Bear
episodes.overview: Mr. Ranger posts a sign of no bear feeding, so Yogi gets an idea to turn Boo Boo into a toy bear so he can return with some goodies.

episodes.name: Pet Vet
episodes.overview: Huck the vet has to help the Zoo Lion feel better.

episodes.name: Heavens to Jinksy
episodes.overview: After a hit on the head, Jinks gets knocked out. A mysterious voice tells him to be nice to Pixie and Dixie if he wants to go "up." He agrees, and Jinks finds that being nice is much harder and more painful than he thought.

episodes.name: Bewitched Bear
episodes.overview: Yogi and Boo Boo use a flying broom from a witch to steal picnic baskets.

episodes.name: Piccadilly Dilly
episodes.overview: A take-off on "Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde."

episodes.name: Goldfish Fever
episodes.overview: Jinks tries to catch the neighbor's goldfish, whilst running into the bulldog. Pixie and Dixie tries to snap Jinks out of his obsession.

episodes.name: Hoodwinked Bear
episodes.overview: Yogi intervenes in the story of Little Red Riding Hood to help rescue Granny from the wolf.

episodes.name: Wiki Waki Huck
episodes.overview: Huck explains life in the Hawaiian Islands.

episodes.name: Pushy Cat
episodes.overview: A cat, claiming to be Jinks' buddy, Arnold, barges in; Arnold's true intention, however, is to catch Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Snow White Bear
episodes.overview: Snow White and The Seven Dwarfs keep disturbing Yogi as he prepares to hibernate for the winter.

episodes.name: Huck's Hack
episodes.overview: This is Huck's first night as a taxi driver, and he picks up his first passenger. Huck mistakes him for a bank executive, but what he doesn't know is that his first passenger is a bank robber, and Huck has an exciting experience with the burglar.

episodes.name: Puss in Boats
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie depart for vacation, but Jinks can't bear to part with them. When the mice begin to feel homesick, they call for Jinks' help.

episodes.name: Space Bear
episodes.overview: An alien disguises himself as Yogi and terrorizes Jellystone with a disintegration gun.

episodes.name: Spud Dud
episodes.overview: Professor Huckleberry Hound meets a big potato and tries to stop him from wreaking havoc.

episodes.name: High Jinks
episodes.overview: Jinks tries to shoot Pixie and Dixie to the moon, but sends them over to a cheese factory. The mice are convinced they are on the moon.

episodes.name: Tricks and Treats
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling set up Farmer Smith to gain free food handouts. Hokey then summons the press to ensure his success.

episodes.name: Legion Bound Hound
episodes.overview: Huck, a sergeant in the Foreign Legion, patrols the trackless desert in search of Powerful Pierre, outlaw king of the shifting sands. Pierre almost gets the best of Huck- till the bad guy's villainous ways finally do him in.

episodes.name: Price for Mice
episodes.overview: Jinks tricks Pixie and Dixie into getting painted white, so he can sell them to a lab. His curiosity soon gets him on a launch to the moon.

episodes.name: Hokey Dokey
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling go house hunting. Hokey scares the Three Little Pigs out of their house, but the pigs and the Big Bad Wolf teach him a lesson.

episodes.name: Science Friction
episodes.overview: Inspector Huck is dispatched to a creepy castle, where he meets up with the wacky Dr. Frankly Stein. Now it's up to Huck to deal with the doctor's newly-created monster Schnitzel!

episodes.name: Plutocrat Cat
episodes.overview: Fed up with Jinks, Pixie and Dixie move in with the rich cat next door, but they don’t find much happiness.

episodes.name: Lamb-Basted Wolf
episodes.overview: After Hokey reads Ding-A-Ling the story of "The Boy who Cried Wolf", Hokey uses the idea to nab some sheep from the farmer, but his plans backfire on him.

episodes.name: Nuts Over Mutts
episodes.overview: The kindly city dogcatcher, humane Huckleberry Hound tries to capture Duffy, a madcap canine, to provide food and shelter for the pitiful beast. But Duffy has seen dogcatchers come and go.

episodes.name: Pied Piper Pipe
episodes.overview: Jinks tries to get his mind off those meeses, so he decides to read the book "The Pied Piper", and gets the idea of using the pipe to tame Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Which Witch Is Witch
episodes.overview: The evil witch from Hansel and Gretel stands by her cauldron stirring the pot for her next victim. The only thing is that Hokey Wolf and Ding A Ling start eating her gingerbread house and run off with her magic broom.

episodes.name: Knight School
episodes.overview: In the golden age of knighthood, every lad wanted to be part of the round table, but Huckleberry Hound was drafted by King Arthur and after boot camp, he becomes Sir Huckleberry Hound.

episodes.name: Woo For Two
episodes.overview: Jinks is in love with Brigette. To his surprise she's engaged to another cat. Pixie and Dixie try to sort the problem out.

episodes.name: Pick a Chick
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding A Ling go after chickens in the hen house disguised as chicken inspectors for a phoney contest.

episodes.name: Huck Hound's Tale
episodes.overview: An aging Huckleberry Hound once again tells his grandson of how he fought the loony Indian Crazy Coyote.

episodes.name: Party Peeper Jinks
episodes.overview: After Jinks rejects Pixie and Dixie from his party, Rocky decides to teach Jinks' a lesson, which makes Jinks distrust his invited friends.

episodes.name: Robot Plot
episodes.overview: A chicken farmer fed up with Hokey's egg snatching makes a robot to dispose of him. After a brief chase, Hokey reprograms the robot to get the farmer.

episodes.name: The Unmasked Avenger
episodes.overview: Huckleberry Hound portrays a mysterious hero in the kingdom.

episodes.name: A Wise Quack
episodes.overview: Jinks sends a duckling out of the house, but Pixie and Dixie convince him to save the duckling from the duck hunting season.

episodes.name: Boobs In The Woods
episodes.overview: Hokey is a bit of a wolf on the make. Hokey's main joy in life was to coax free meals out of the clueless, which he seemed to do with ease.

episodes.name: Hillbilly Huck
episodes.overview: Huck moves to the hills and meets a hot-tempered hillbilly who doesn't like anyone by the name of "Huckleberry."

episodes.name: Missile Bound Cat
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie meets their favorite T.V. hero, Space Cat. The space hero swings by their home to teach Mr. Jinks a lesson.

episodes.name: Castle Hassle
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling explore a castle, empty except for the Queen. When the Queen sends the wolves to deliver an apple to Snow White, they sabotage her plan.

episodes.name: Fast Gun Huck
episodes.overview: In the old West, the famous gunfighters captured the imagination of the country, but when a small town is terrorized by Teeny Terwilliger, they call for The Huckleberry Kid.

episodes.name: Kind To Meeces Week
episodes.overview: Spike tries to convince Jinks it is "Be Kind to Animals Week". When Jinks gets the message, Pixie and Dixie take advantage of this.

episodes.name: Booty On The Bounty
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling turn themselves over to an assistant warden for the reward bounty followed by a bail. They repeat this scheme many times successfully.

episodes.name: Astro-nut Huck
episodes.overview: Huck is a reluctant astronaut for a space test. After he's willing to be a "astro-guinea pig" he accepts the job but then turns yellow chicken when he's supposed to actually go inside a missile.

episodes.name: Crew Cat
episodes.overview: Jinks tricks Pixie and Dixie to board onto a ship so he can get a free trip as the ship's new cat to get rid of mice when one of his friends get fired from the job.

episodes.name: Hokey In The Pokey
episodes.overview: Two thieves have stolen a valuable painting and hide in Hokey's cave. Ten months later they try to take the painting from the wolves at gunpoint, until the wolves turn them over to the police.

episodes.name: Huck and Ladder
episodes.overview: Firefighter Huck helps a circus owner to recapture a gorilla on the loose.

episodes.name: Jinxed Jinks
episodes.overview: Jinks gets Pixie and Dixie an insurance policy, for his own personal gain. He tries to get the mice in an accident but runs into one of his own.

episodes.name: Who's Zoo
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling go to the lion cage at the zoo to try to get the meat from the lion. After several failed attempts, they join up in the wolf cage.

episodes.name: Lawman Huck
episodes.overview: Deputy Huckleberry is told by his sheriff to take Dinky Dalton all the way to Kansas City for a trial, but trouble starts when Dinky escapes from Huck's handcuffs on a train.

episodes.name: Light Headed Cat
episodes.overview: Jinks has applied for a job, which unknown to him will have his gravity removed. A monkey keeps Jinks in anti-gravity for a long time.

episodes.name: Dogged Sheep Dog
episodes.overview: Hokey convinces a sheep dog to train Ding-A-Ling as a sheep dog to steal a lamb. But the training is hindering Hokey's attempts.

episodes.name: Cluck and Dagger
episodes.overview: Agent Huckleberry Hound is assigned to deliver a secret-filled briefcase to the country of Rutabaga and is followed around by foreign spies.

episodes.name: Mouse For Rent
episodes.overview: Jinks starts up a renting service, where cats can rent Pixie and Dixie. When the business starts to prosper, the mice take over.

episodes.name: Too Much To Bear
episodes.overview: Under the pretext of detective work, Hokey and Ding-A-Ling go to The Three Bears' house to acquire their food and beds. But they are met with the burglar Lightfingers Louie.

episodes.name: Caveman Huck
episodes.overview: Huckleberry Hound leaves his prehistoric cave in search of dinosaur meat for his hungry prehistoric dog, so he sets his sights on a big dinosaur. Unfortunately for Caveman Huck, the dinosaur has other plans.

episodes.name: Jinks' Jinx
episodes.overview: When Jinks' old pal Howard visits, the two begin having fun with Pixie and Dixie, who take it upon themselves to convince Jinks that Howard brings bad luck (since Howard is a black cat).

episodes.name: Movies Are Bitter Than Ever
episodes.overview: Hokey uses a movie set to sneak out some sheep being herded by a sheep dog. The farmer and sheep dog wise up to the wolves' trick and chase after them.

episodes.name: Huck of the Irish
episodes.overview: News photographer Huckleberry Hound is assigned by Strife Magazine to go to Ireland to photograph the never-before photographed Leprechaun.

episodes.name: Fresh Heir
episodes.overview: Jinks has inherited from Mrs. Smithers an old mansion and moves in, leaving Pixie and Dixie behind. The two mice make the place haunted to scare Jinks into going back home.

episodes.name: Poached Yeggs
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling capture a fire-breathing dragon and turn him into a prince to kiss Sleeping Beauty. But things don't turn out right for the dragon and wolves.

episodes.name: Jungle Bungle
episodes.overview: Jungle Huck lives in the jungle, swings from tree to tree, saves baby monkeys from hungry lions, and summons elephants with his piercing jungle call. Persuaded to demonstrate before the camera, things don't seem to go right.

episodes.name: Strong Mouse
episodes.overview: Jinks is taken to meet Master cat Gus, while Pixie and Dixie's cousin Hercules comes and unknowingly saves Jinks' bacon from Gus.

episodes.name: Rushing Wolf Hound
episodes.overview: A farmer buys an exotic watchdog called Wau-Wau, who hates wolves. After many failed attempts, Hokey turns the watchdog against the farmer.

episodes.name: Bullfighter Huck
episodes.overview: Bullfighter Huckleberry Hound never looked handsomer than at the moment he entered the ring. Outfought and outwitted by his opponent in the Plaza do Toros, Senor Huckleberry decides that the bull has never attended bullfighting school.

episodes.name: Bombay Mouse
episodes.overview: An Indian mouse named Tabu meets Pixie and Dixie and demonstrates some magic on Jinks. Tabu leaves a few magic tricks behind as he departs.

episodes.name: The Glass Sneaker
episodes.overview: Prince Charming hires Hokey and Ding-A-Ling as detectives to track down Cinderella. He overlooks her and tangles with her two stepsisters before giving her the glass sneaker.

episodes.name: Ben Huck
episodes.overview: Ben Huck took a beating from the Mad Barbarian. It was so bad Ben hid disguised as a statue in Rome. A travel narrator who discovers his secret, is sworn by Huckleberry to silence because the Mad Barbarian is still searching for him.

episodes.name: Mouse Trapped
episodes.overview: Jinks builds a robot mouse dame to get Pixie and Dixie to squabble over her affection. When they see through the trick, they use the robot mouse against Jinks.

episodes.name: Indian Giver
episodes.overview: The young "Injun" Hiawatha hunts down Hokey and eventually brings him back to his tribe. Hokey then attracts the attention of more young "Injuns."

episodes.name: Huck dé Paree
episodes.overview: While Gendarme Huck is on patrol in Paris, Powerful Pierre robs a bank.

episodes.name: Magician Jinks
episodes.overview: Jinks receives a magic kit. With it, he makes Pixie and Dixie disappear. The mice aided by a bulldog to get even with him.

episodes.name: Chock Full Chuck Wagon
episodes.overview: Hokey attempts to get close to a chuck wagon to swipe some of the sheriff's food. Just when the wolves have driven the sheriff away, an actual cattle stampede drives them away.

episodes.name: Bars and Stripes
episodes.overview: Huckleberry Hound is the ruler of Alkatrash Prison, which no man has ever escaped. Nowhere outside of the walls will the inmates find the luxuries he provides. There’s a waiting list to enjoy the food, the swimming pool and the theater inside.

episodes.name: Meece Missiles
episodes.overview: Jinks tries to dispose of Pixie and Dixie in a balloon. The mice are tailed by the air force and broadcast on television.

episodes.name: Bring 'Em Back A Live One
episodes.overview: After falling for one of Hokey's tricks, Farmer Smith hires a professional hunter and his hunting dog to capture Hokey alive. Sure enough, there's no escape from the hunter.

episodes.name: The Scrubby Brush Man
episodes.overview: Nobody has been able to sell brushes to the householders of the 13th district. The company’s top sales genius, Huckleberry Hound, is sent out to the terrible 13th.

episodes.name: Homeless Jinks
episodes.overview: Jinks loses his job and Pixie and Dixie tries to get his job back by sending in tons of mice.

episodes.name: A Star Is Bored
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling come to Hollywood to become stars. After bypassing security, the only part they play is sweeping the studio.

episodes.name: Two For Tee Vee
episodes.overview: Huckleberry Hound is called to repair a TV set for a lady, but the family bulldog has other ideas.

episodes.name: Home Flea
episodes.overview: A homeward bound flea with great strength takes refuge on Jinks and prevents him from bullying Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: West Of The Pesos
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling enter Dry Gap Gulch Flat. With some trickery, they arrest Orful Meany, but Hokey is then stuck as a sheriff.

episodes.name: Phony-O and Juliet
episodes.overview: After another failed attempt at wooing Juliet, Romeo sends for Hokey to reclaim his love. He succeeds, but ends up empty-handed.

episodes.name: Hokey's Missing Millions
episodes.overview: Billionaire J.B. Goldstone gives Hokey and Ding-A-Ling a large sum of money. Unfortunately, Hokey misses his opportunity and tries to get the money the hard way, all for nothing.

episodes.name: Loot to Boot
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling apply for a watchdog job at Mula Manor. When a burglar robs the place, the wolves get the blame until Hokey clears the matter up.

episodes.name: Guesting Games
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling try to barge into a hotel, but the hotel detective won't allow them around. Later, the police force them to leave.

episodes.name: Sick Sense
episodes.overview: The Animal Hospital has had enough of Hokey's freeloading under a false pretense of sickness. Hokey manages to trick them again, but this time an operation is in store for him.

episodes.name: Aladdin's Lamb Chops
episodes.overview: Hokey and Ding-A-Ling disguise themselves as genies to fool Farmer Jones into giving them food. Jones soon discovers their game and also learns that the lamp really has a genie.

episodes.name: Bean Pod'ners
episodes.overview: Hokey accidentally grows a giant beanstalk. Up the beanstalk, they enter a castle inhabited by a nice giant and his dog. Of course the wolves run and chop down the beanstalk.
